Summary: Was flashed and followe by ufo's
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in the front of my house looking for ufo's cause there out here every night but the last 3 days i have seen these low hovering orange pulsating plasma balls with what seems to be a brown tip I noticed it over the top of my neighbors house and I walked toward it and flashe my led flash light at it and it turned toward me and started violently flashing a gold light at me and slowly came toward me it scared the %^&* out of me i ran to my other neighbors house whom i have never met he came out and it flew back wards a little bit so it wasent as large but you could still see it was not natural my neighbor and his girlfriend were shocked i was scared i ran to my truck and tried to get to town i could see there were a few of them now and they were tracking me all across town i went to my friends house and ran inside and told them i thought i was being followed by ufo's and they said orange ones and i said ya they told me thay hyave been seeing them too we all went out on the porch toghter and they started floating down toward us one of them cloaked its self but you could clearly see the outline of it
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fremont
There was one other sighting in Fremont on or around July 2nd 2011
